description: This file defines the PatientService class which interacts with backend API endpoints related to patient profiles, including fetching, updating, and listing patients. It uses an ApiClient for HTTP requests and the Patient model for data serialization.

classes.name: PatientService
classes.description: A service class providing methods to fetch and update patient profiles from a backend API.

methods.name: getMyProfile
methods.description: Fetches the current user's patient profile from the API.

methods.name: updateMyProfile
methods.description: Updates the current user's patient profile with new data.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Lists patients with optional pagination parameters.
